author: oheger
msg: Deleted FileLocator interface and renamed FileLocatorImpl to FileLocator.
There is no need for an interface. An immutable FileLocator class is

author: oheger
msg: Moved FileLocatorImpl to a top-level class.
We are going to use this class directly later on.

author: oheger
msg: Added a locate() method to FileHandler.
This method ensures that the referenced file is once located (if possible).
Then a locate() operation does not have to be performed every time the file is

author: oheger
msg: Added a method for checking whether a locator is fully initialized.
Because the way a file is referenced by a FileLocator can make a difference
when the file is actually accessed it makes sense to have a method which checks
this. This helps client code to decide whether fullyInitializedLocator()
needs to be called. FileHandler also needs this information to provide
functionality to initialize its FileLocator on demand.
